title: Conference Call to Discuss New Savings in Medicare and Medicaid | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




June 12, 2009

 



Conference Call to Discuss New Savings in Medicare and Medicaid




 THE WHITE HOUSE Office of the Press Secretary  ___________________________________________________________  MEDIA ADVISORY                                          June 12, 2009     TODAY: Embargoed Conference Call to Discuss New Savings in Medicare and Medicaid  Today at 5:45 PM EDT, OMB Director Peter Orszag and Office of Health Reform Director Nancy-Ann DeParle will hold an embargoed conference call with reporters to discuss new savings proposals to be announced by President Obama in tomorrow’s weekly address. The President referenced these savings in a recent letter to Senators regarding health reform, indicating that specifics of the proposals would follow. The call and report are embargoed for 6:00 AM tomorrow. The call will be on the record. What: Embargoed Conference call with Peter Orszag and Nancy-Ann DeParle When: Today, June 12, at 5:45 PM EDT Dial-in: (800) 230-1059 Embargo: 6:00 AM EDT tomorrow ###
